infos.value: King Oelde... Can we truly trust you?
Schuzelt... Is this how you thank the king that saved your life?
My duty is to escort Lady Machérie to Fennes without fail.
I will gladly suffer your accusations of insolence to keep my lady safe.
I've no intention of setting foot in Fennes.
But Lady Machérie! What of your engagement to King Muraga!?
Surely you've noticed something amiss. These raids of late are...suspicious.
King Oelde, I'd like to see Leonis Castle. Would I be welcome?
Very well. Pray come and feast your eyes on our most celebrated den—the Castle of Lions.
